title: If Biden Wins, Would He Allow the Resumption of Work Visas Suspended By Trump?
subtitle: The immigration and visa policies of presidential candidates, like many hot issues during elections, are complicated.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: If 2020 Democratic candidate Joe Biden wins the presidential election in November, he would end suspensions on specific work visas, like the H-1B and J-1 visas, imposed by the Trump administration.
